nodes.text: The Karstaxon Regions was an area of the Outer Rim Territories that bordered Hutt Space, the Iotran Expanse, the Suolriep and Ansuroer sectors, and the Periphery. It was located in the Tharin sector and contained the planets Karnst and Talir.

During the final days of the Galactic Republic, Jedi and Judiciary forces seized 100 metric tons of illegal ryll spice that was being smuggled through the region by Black Sun. The Weequay Labansat was a notorious mercenary who plied the Karstaxon Regions, along with the Lesser Plooriod Cluster.
